name: Untitled Space Game - Post Jam
description:
Thanks for viewing 'Untitled Space Game'!

Note that because of limitations of the web browser not being able to control your mouse (for obvious reasons) you may have trouble placing buildings at first.

To fix this, once you load into a game, press your Escape key on your keyboard so the mouse will show and position it close to the center of your screen.

The game is a lot smoother if downloaded! Go give the official submission for the Mashup GameJam a try and leave an honest review https://epr-dev.itch.io/untitled-space-game

Currently updated!

- Reworked enemy AI to actually attack stuff instead of getting stuck in spawn

- You can now stand on buildings and regen your jetpack from it

- Minor balance changes to combat the fact that the enemy is not as stupid anymore

- Generously introduced a feature where the beacon spawns in the air on the medium/small worlds, making them impossible to lose on
